version_description: For a special promo event from Apple about German developers, I have adapted the App Store content. Sorry, no new features. Nevertheless, you are welcome to leave a review and â€‹rate my game. That helps me a lot!

QB goes FREEMIUM. 

The first 20 levels of QB - a cube's tale are now free to play. If you enjoy the game feel free to buy the full version and puzzle throw 80+ tricky levels.

If you already bought the paid version of the game, you can unlock the full version in the settings menu.
